\n \n

rating控件

\n

用于评级评分

\n

如何使用

\n

暂无

\n

示例

\n

##基础Rating

\n

常用于评级评分

\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
.content{\n padding: 10px;\n}\n.example{\n width: 60%;\n margin: 80px;\n}\n.col-xs-4{\n width: 33.3%;\n float: left;\n}
\n
\n
(function(document, window, $) {\n 'use strict';\n\n var defaults= {\n targetKeep: true,\n icon: "font",\n starType: "i",\n starOff: "icon uf uf-star",\n starOn: "icon uf uf-star orange-600",\n cancelOff: "icon uf uf-minussigninsideablackcircle",\n cancelOn: "icon uf uf-minussigninsideablackcircle orange-600",\n starHalf: "icon uf uf-starhalfempty orange-500"\n };\n $('[data-plugin="rating"]').each(function() {\n var $this = $(this);\n\n\n $this.raty(options);\n });\n // }\n // });\n })(document, window, jQuery);
\n
\n
 <div class="u-rating" data-score="3" data-plugin="rating"></div>
\n
\n\n

##所个star的Rating

\n

通过在html上 的属性 data-number值改变数量

\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
.content{\n padding: 10px;\n}\n.example{\n width: 60%;\n margin: 80px;\n}\n.col-xs-4{\n width: 33.3%;\n float: left;\n}
\n
\n
<div class="example">\n <div class="u-rating" data-number="10" data-plugin="rating"></div>\n </div>
\n
\n
(function(document, window, $) {\n 'use strict';\n\n var defaults= {\n targetKeep: true,\n icon: "font",\n starType: "i",\n starOff: "icon uf uf-star",\n starOn: "icon uf uf-star orange-600",\n cancelOff: "icon uf uf-minussigninsideablackcircle",\n cancelOn: "icon uf uf-minussigninsideablackcircle orange-600",\n starHalf: "icon uf uf-starhalfempty orange-500"\n };\n $('[data-plugin="rating"]').each(function() {\n var $this = $(this);\n var options = $.extend(true, {}, defaults, $this.data());\n\n if (options.hints) {\n options.hints = options.hints.split(',');\n }\n\n $this.raty(options);\n });\n // }\n // });\n })(document, window, jQuery);
\n
\n\n

##不同尺寸Rating

\n

u-rating-lg u-rating-sm供尺寸的选择

\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
.content{\n padding: 10px;\n}\n.example{\n width: 60%;\n margin: 80px;\n}\n.col-xs-4{\n width: 33.3%;\n float: left;\n}
\n
\n
<div class="example">\n <div class="margin-bottom-10">\n <div class="u-rating u-rating-sm" data-score="4" data-plugin="rating"></div>\n </div>\n <div class="margin-bottom-10">\n <div class="u-rating" data-score="4" data-plugin="rating"></div>\n </div>\n <div>\n <div class="u-rating u-rating-lg" data-score="4" data-plugin="rating"></div>\n </div>\n</div>
\n
\n
(function(document, window, $) {\n 'use strict';\n\n var defaults= {\n targetKeep: true,\n icon: "font",\n starType: "i",\n starOff: "icon uf uf-star",\n starOn: "icon uf uf-star orange-600",\n cancelOff: "icon uf uf-minussigninsideablackcircle",\n cancelOn: "icon uf uf-minussigninsideablackcircle orange-600",\n starHalf: "icon uf uf-starhalfempty orange-500"\n };\n $('[data-plugin="rating"]').each(function() {\n var $this = $(this);\n var options = $.extend(true, {}, defaults, $this.data());\n\n if (options.hints) {\n options.hints = options.hints.split(',');\n }\n\n $this.raty(options);\n });\n // }\n // });\n })(document, window, jQuery);
\n
\n\n\n\n
